author: denizsun
body:
#### PR description:

  - This PR fixes the fatal error introduced in [PR #48211](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48211) described in [issue#48243](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48243). 
  
#### PR validation:

- runTheMatrix test has been completed.

####  Backport:

- This is not a backport PR.
title: [HCAL-DQM] Resolve fatal error introduced in PR #48211 (see issue #48243)
